revision.text:
Below is a table showing the effectiveness of each Pokemon type. It can be used to prioritize [[Shards|shard]] upgrades.
=Type effectiveness table=

Steel !! =Practicality=
''See [[Shards]] for a list of optimal farming routes for each type of shard.''
Using the Damage Calculator screen in the Start Menu, a breakdown of how much damage each type contributes to the total can be seen. Types that do the most damage generally should be upgraded with shards first.
Some types don't do damage of certain categories to any other type. '''To avoid wasting shards, don't make the following upgrades:'''
====Very Effective (last row)====
*Normal
====Immune (first row)====
*Fire *Water *Grass *Ice *Flying *Bug *Rock *Dark *Steel *Fairy
